What is the providerâ€™s role in Additio.answer: An overview of these types of Additional Child Care Subsidy is provided for providers' information and to allow them to support families who may be eligible.

Is child care rebate means tested?.answer: Currently the Government provides two payments to families to help with childcare costs: the means-tested Child Care Benefit and the Child Care Rebate, which is not means-tested. The two payments will be replaced with one means-tested payment called the Child Care Subsidy.

What is the additional child care subsid.answer: The Additional Child Care Subsidy is a top up payment in addition to the Child Care Subsidy which will provide targeted additional fee assistance to families and children facing barriers in accessing affordable child care. The Additional Child Care Subsidy has four elements: Child Wellbeing. Grandparents.
